2102460.name: Silent Harbor
2102460.description:
Silent Harbor- is a first-person horror adventure game that will immerse you in a creepy story.
You have to go in search of your missing wife, who sailed away on an expedition and never returned.
You in the role of Carl Jones go in search of her.
On the way you are enveloped in thick fog,
and in the distance a bell is heard, and a small fishing village begins to be seen.
Since Karl is very tired on the way, he decides to stay in the village until the morning.

Game Play
Collect evidence.
Chat with the villagers to find out more information.
Solve riddles and puzzles
Explore the village
Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of this place
Each new launch of the game will not be the same
The game will be unique for each player
Silent Harbor - has multiple endings
2102460.supported_languages:
英语*, 乌克兰语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
